data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Shabwah, Yemen so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shabwah, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Shabwah to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Shabwah you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Shabwah, Yemen.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Muhamasheen, Akhdam people.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Shabwah.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Shabwah, Yemen that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Shabwah who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Shabwah
location.cities_list: Ataq, Khimār, AL-khashā upper, Salābah, AL-khashā Lower
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ataq (37,315), Khimār (3,000), AL-khashā upper (1,100), Salābah (1,000), AL-khashā Lower (800)
